text: Rhembastus variabilis is a species of leaf beetle. It is distributed in South Africa, Mozambique, the Democratic Republic of the Congo, Sudan, and West Africa as far as Guinea and Ivory Coast. It was described by the German entomologist in 1877. ==References== Category:Eumolpinae Category:Beetles of the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:Insects of South Africa Category:Insects of Mozambique Category:Insects of Sudan Category:Insects of West Africa Category:Beetles described in 1877
title: Rhembastus variabilis
